LanguageData.Penis.label: penis
LanguageData.Penis.description: A humanlike penis. The entire shaft is covered in skin, which can be pulled back enough to expose the sensitive head at the tip. Lacking a sheath, it just dangles around when not erect.
LanguageData.Vagina.label: vagina
LanguageData.Vagina.description: A humanlike vagina. The larger outer labia covers the smaller inner labia, that in turn protects the vaginal opening and the urethra. The clitoris is hidden inside a hood.
LanguageData.Anus.label: anus
LanguageData.Anus.description: A humanlike anus. The wrinkled hole is trapped between two fat cheeks. Apparently, only humanlikes have butts like these.
LanguageData.Breasts.label: breasts
LanguageData.Breasts.description: A pair of humanlike breasts. Being an important part of sexual attraction to humanlikes, they keep their fat and round form even when not breastfeeding. Sometimes.
LanguageData.FeaturelessChest.label: featureless chest
LanguageData.FeaturelessChest.description: Smooth, featureless chest without nipples where they should be.
